author: Yilei Sun
title: China's auto industry wastes no time coaxing drivers back to showrooms after lockdown
description: China's auto industry has gone from zero to sixty in its post-pandemic campaign drive, with manufacturers and dealers quick to woo back lockdown-weary consumers through campaigns as unusual as a makeup-promoting personality touting car leasing.
content: BEIJING (Reuters) - China’s auto industry has gone from zero to sixty in its post-pandemic campaign drive, with manufacturers and dealers quick to woo back lockdown-weary consumers through campaigns as unusual as a makeup-promoting personality touting car lea… [+4360 chars]
